sentences.sentence: The advantages of the method of calculating the orthographically projective transformation are concluded.
sentences.translation: ③简要分析这种计算方法的特点。

sentences.sentence: Georgiou points out that English is an orthographically inconsistent language; in other words, letters can have more than one sound each.
sentences.translation: 乔治奥指出英语是一种正字法不一致的语言；换言之，每个字母都有一个以上的读音。
